ModMetaData.name: Colonist Bar Hiding
ModMetaData.author: Saucy_Pigeon
ModMetaData.description:
Allows you to hide individual colonists from your colonist bar, decreasing clutter.
How it works: - Right click on your colonist bar or go into mod settings. - Click "Edit hidden colonists...". - Click "Show" or "Hide" on the appropriate colonist.
Compatible with: - Save games - Color Coded Mood Bar - Pawn Badge
Incompatible with: - Colonist Bar KF
Special thanks: - Proxyer for providing the Japanese translation. - Antisodium for providing the Chinese translation.
